name: Acid Rain (osh.studio)
description:
Play Full Screen if you can :) Acid Rain

Made as a Submission to Ludum Dare 51 - Every 10 Seconds

Controls:

Use arrow keys and spacebar OR controller.

Time Based Puzzle Platformer

Play as a sci fi dude trying to deliver a package to his bae. Take cover as acid rain falls from the sky every 10 seconds.

Dev Thoughts

Really enjoyed Ludum Dare 51, I thought I wanted this theme, but after reading much of what other people thought, I'm not so sure. Going for the compo submission and finally making it for the first time! Didn't learn too much new with this entry, as I was feeling a bit out of touch with my gamedev. However I am happy with this simple game.

Special thanks to my Abbie, Dad, and Josie for play testing.

Dev ChangeLog

Am aware of bug that prevents Restart Game, also that my build is a development build
